title: Barikui1
author: Barikui1
content: My country people I dy hail ona, we know say we wey be naija blood we no dy carry last, we no know how to give up, because even in this difficult economic situation/ hardship we still find a reason to smile again, so I just reason am this morning if we fit cheer each other up with jokes just to brighten our mood and some of us wey wan give up, so that dem go get reason to keep on grinding without feeling pity for our self.* Earthquake in china for days but electricity still dy on, but in my kontry once two birds quarrel or fight on top of a pole, Boom!! There will be no light for months.Share your own please, try to be the reason someone smiles today.

comments.author: Su-asa
comments.body: What the fuck ate you trying to tell us? That we should share our jokes. Brother man, if you really dey fund were to share jokes, I go really appreciate am if only you go carry this discussion go to the off-topic board or any of your social media page,,, you go get the kind of jokes them way you want. You fit even try TikTok or Facebook because those platforms nah were you go fit entertain your self with pipos jokes and all the rest.This place is a place to talk about some useful things like Bitcoin discussion or political something and other things that can help pipo,,, but for jokes, it's not permitted as we all are trying to reajust the way some of us including me post off topic things here, however I have try to stop that, so I do suggest you too stop that and lock this thread.

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: People no too like joke and this forum always dey minded for business and bitcoin discussion but even though we still dey share some jokes no means say something don spoiled, I go only advised we should mind the kind of jokes we share here because persin fit dey undergo that kind of joke and mistakenly quote or involved am him/she fit pick offense. Although I never see any joking topic for this we board but rather I don see were them talk about proverbs so, somehow you fit still make use of that section to dey drop some proverbs as some dey very funny for ear.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: If it is about bitcoin, you can watch this comedy which is just two weeks old, but do not laugh too much: https://youtu.be/NWhxmWBHFe0?si=Mtj3V9Vy7OM4akvvFrom the comedy, you will know how to buy offline bitcoin  I think it is worth sharing.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on November 14, 2023, 01:50:27 PMIf it is about bitcoin, you can watch this comedy which is just two weeks old, but do not laugh too much: https://youtu.be/NWhxmWBHFe0?si=Mtj3V9Vy7OM4akvvFrom the comedy, you will know how to buy offline bitcoin  I think it is worth sharing.My oga you Dey owe me data make I just clear you my mind because I don watch this video like 3 times now and I just want say thank you for showing me this one.Abeg for the rest of the other posters above, make una take things easy and don’t transfer any sort of bitterness to the next person please , his post has no harm for all this una harsh words and more over all works and no play makes jack a dull boy and also remember that there are also several other bitcoin jokes as well that enlighten us about bitcoin and a typical example is in the link @charlse-Tim already posted and for the record, the forum no be just about bitcoin else we wouldn’t be having other boards like the the politics and society board.
